content:
{{knowledge objective

|Rank=A
|Title=Knowing the epidemiology of smoking in men and women
|Description=Knowledge
|Rubric=Epidemiology
|Contributors=
|Order=8}}


*30.4% of people (aged 18 to 75) say they smoke tobacco (2019).
**men 34.6%
**women 26.5%

question.title: What percentage of people aged 18 to 75 say they smoke tobacco?

option_a.title: Men only
option_a.description: Only men aged 18 to 75 say they smoke tobacco

option_b.title: Women only
option_b.description: Only women aged 18 to 75 say they smoke tobacco

option_c.description: 34.6% of people aged 18 to 75 say they smoke tobacco

option_d.description: 26.5% of people aged 18 to 75 say they smoke tobacco
